name: wrqleasypy
title: Wrql's Easy Py Lottery system
author: Wei-ren-qu-liu
description: A set of random formula and item conversion are added to make py series mod easier, and the function of auxiliary random property is added without changing the original difficulty. 增加了一组随机配方和物品转换来使得py系列mod显得更容易，在不改变原有难度的基础上增加的辅助随机性质的功能
